data: Nurse to initiate Pre Procedure phase of this plan
Consent must be signed before narcotics or sedatives administered

Infection Control Protocol: If patient suspected for Tuberculosis (TB), ensure Patient Isolation order listed below is selected when ordering PowerPlan
1. Order Name: Patient Isolation
2. Isolation Ordered: Airborne 
3. Isolation Reason: Query for Tuberculosis (TB)

No exceptions, for at least 8 hours pre-procedure
